faqs.body: The clubs is open to any student, ranging from novice developers who are just starting, to advanced developers who want to further their skills.

faqs.header: How frequently do events and workshops occur?
faqs.body: We hold workshops and showcases at Academy of Technology & we would recommend you to join our community by becoming a member to get updates. 𝐃𝐨 𝐧𝐨𝐭𝐞 𝐭𝐡𝐚𝐭 𝐰𝐞 𝐚𝐫𝐞 𝐜𝐮𝐫𝐫𝐞𝐧𝐭𝐥𝐲 𝐡𝐨𝐬𝐭𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐚𝐥𝐥 𝐞𝐯𝐞𝐧𝐭𝐬 𝐯𝐢𝐫𝐭𝐮𝐚𝐥𝐥𝐲 𝐛𝐞𝐜𝐚𝐮𝐬𝐞 𝐨𝐟 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐂𝐎𝐕𝐈𝐃-𝟏𝟗 𝐩𝐚𝐧𝐝𝐞𝐦𝐢𝐜!

faqs.header: What should I carry when attending a workshop?
faqs.body: We recommend you carry with you a notebook, pen and a laptop because more often than not we make our hands dirty with code. Most importantly, carry along a healthy dose of curiosity and enthusiasm.

faqs.header: Who should I reach out to if I have any questions?
faqs.body: If you have any questions or comments, please don't hesitate to drop a mail to us! We would be happy to stay engaged via email even after the event.
